description:
QualityHighlighter is a simple plugin for KeePass that highlights entries based on the password quality. Highlighting is done in [5 categories](http://keepass.info/help/kb/pw_quality_est.html) as follows:

<= 64 bits - Red - Very Weak  
64-80 bits - Orange - Weak  
81-112 bits - Yellow - Moderate  
113-128 bits - Yellow-Green - Strong  
>128 bits - Green - Very Strong

The plugin features a button on the KeePass toolbar to toggle the highlights on and off.

This plugin pairs very well with the [QualityColumn plugin](https://chocolatey.org/packages/keepass-plugin-qualitycolumn).
summary: Plugin for KeePass 2.x to highlight entries based on their password quality
author: Scott Richter
